subject: Inquiry for Car racing simulator
description_text:
Dear Sirs,

 

          You are kindly requested to quote us your best prices for car
racing simulator equipment

For the following:

 

1-car simulator fixed type three screens with paddles ,manual gear and
clutch qty: 16

2-car simulator movable type four axis  type three screens with paddles
,manual gear and clutch qty: 12

 

Please send me with price catalogue ,specifications and technical data.

 

If you have any question ,please don't hesitate to contact us.

 

Anis Abdel

Mechanical Engineer 

Global Smart

Tel: 962 6 5353287

Fax:962 6 5335395

Cell/Whatsapp/Wechat: 962 79 0561581

Amman - Jordan
